metadata.course: Data Science and Machine Learning for Engineers
metadata.description: Scavenger hunts across web, literature, and codebase

hunts.name: Dataset Discovery
hunts.description: Find interesting chemical engineering datasets for practice

tasks.task: Find a dataset on Kaggle related to chemical processes or materials
tasks.deliverable: Link to dataset with 1-sentence description of what it contains

tasks.task: Find a dataset from UCI Machine Learning Repository related to chemistry or engineering
tasks.deliverable: Link and brief description of prediction task it could support

tasks.task: Find a government or research dataset with process measurements
tasks.deliverable: Link and description of variables included

bonus.task: Load one of your found datasets and show df.info() output

hunts.name: scikit-learn Explorer
hunts.description: Navigate scikit-learn documentation to find key resources

tasks.task: Find the scikit-learn User Guide page for Linear Models
tasks.deliverable: Link to page

tasks.task: Find documentation for train_test_split function
tasks.deliverable: Link and list 3 important parameters

tasks.task: Find an example in scikit-learn gallery using Ridge or Lasso
tasks.deliverable: Link to example and 1-sentence summary of what it demonstrates

tasks.task: Find the API reference for Pipeline
tasks.deliverable: Link and explain why Pipelines prevent data leakage

bonus.task: Find the scikit-learn MOOC (online course) and report one insight from it

hunts.name: Visualization Gallery
hunts.description: Viz Vizzy's hunt: Find inspiring data visualizations

tasks.task: Find the Matplotlib gallery of plot examples
tasks.deliverable: Link to gallery

tasks.task: Find a seaborn example that would work well for correlation analysis
tasks.deliverable: Link and explain why it's good for correlations

tasks.task: Find an example of a PCA visualization (scores plot or biplot)
tasks.deliverable: Link or image with explanation of what it shows

tasks.task: Find an example of a SHAP summary plot in the SHAP documentation
tasks.deliverable: Link and explanation of how to read it

bonus.task: Create one of the visualizations you found using course data

hunts.name: Machine Learning in ChemE
hunts.description: Find papers applying ML to chemical engineering problems

tasks.task: Find a paper using machine learning for property prediction (viscosity, density, etc.)
tasks.deliverable: Citation, what property was predicted, and what features were used

tasks.task: Find a paper using ML for process optimization or control
tasks.deliverable: Citation and 1-paragraph summary of the approach

tasks.task: Find a paper that compares multiple ML algorithms on a ChemE problem
tasks.deliverable: Citation and which algorithm performed best (and why they thought so)

bonus.task: Find a paper that discusses uncertainty quantification in ML predictions

hunts.name: The Overfitting Hunt
hunts.description: Barry Bias-Variance's challenge: Find cautionary tales about overfitting

tasks.task: Find a paper or article discussing ML failures due to overfitting or data leakage
tasks.deliverable: Link/citation and description of what went wrong

tasks.task: Find the paper 'Leakage in data mining' by Kaufman et al. or similar foundational paper
tasks.deliverable: Citation and key recommendations from the paper

tasks.task: Find an example where a published model couldn't be reproduced
tasks.deliverable: Description of the case and what might have caused it

bonus.task: Find a paper about best practices for ML reproducibility in science

hunts.name: XGBoost Deep Dive
hunts.description: Greta Gradient-Boost's hunt: Master XGBoost documentation

tasks.task: Find the XGBoost documentation page on parameters
tasks.deliverable: Link

tasks.task: Find and explain 3 important hyperparameters and their effects
tasks.deliverable: Parameter names, default values, and what tuning them does

tasks.task: Find XGBoost's built-in feature importance methods
tasks.deliverable: List the different importance types and what each measures

tasks.task: Find how XGBoost handles missing values
tasks.deliverable: Explanation of the approach and when it might fail

bonus.task: Find the original XGBoost paper by Chen & Guestrin and identify one key innovation

tasks.task: Find where .isna() is used in the course notebooks
tasks.deliverable: Notebook and cell number, plus context of why it was used

tasks.task: Find an example of train_test_split in the course code
tasks.deliverable: Location and what test_size was used

tasks.task: Find where cross-validation is used
tasks.deliverable: Location, which CV strategy was used, and why

bonus.task: Find the most complex Pipeline in the course notebooks

hunts.name: Pattern Finder
hunts.description: Query Quinn's hunt: Find interesting patterns in course code

tasks.task: Find all places where StandardScaler is used
tasks.deliverable: List of locations and whether it was used correctly (fit on train only)

tasks.task: Find where feature importance is calculated
tasks.deliverable: Location and which method was used

tasks.task: Find examples of hyperparameter tuning
tasks.deliverable: Location, method used (GridSearch, RandomSearch, etc.), and parameters tuned

bonus.task: Find a potential data leakage bug in any course notebook (or confirm none exist)

hunts.name: SHAP Investigation
hunts.description: SHAP Shapley's hunt: Understand model interpretability tools

tasks.task: Find the SHAP library documentation
tasks.deliverable: Link to main documentation page

tasks.task: Find examples of 4 different SHAP plot types
tasks.deliverable: Links/images with 1-sentence description of what each shows

tasks.task: Find the original SHAP paper (Lundberg & Lee)
tasks.deliverable: Citation and key claim from abstract

tasks.task: Find documentation on SHAP's TreeExplainer vs KernelExplainer
tasks.deliverable: When to use each and computational differences

bonus.task: Find a paper comparing SHAP to other interpretability methods (LIME, etc.)

hunts.name: Uncertainty Quantification Quest
hunts.description: Quinn Quantify's advanced hunt: Deep dive into UQ

tasks.task: Find a paper on Gaussian Processes for chemical engineering applications
tasks.deliverable: Citation and what problem GPs were used for

tasks.task: Find documentation on sklearn's GaussianProcessRegressor
tasks.deliverable: Link and explanation of key kernel choices

tasks.task: Find a paper or tutorial on conformal prediction
tasks.deliverable: Link/citation and 1-paragraph explanation of the approach

bonus.task: Find a comparison of UQ methods (bootstrap, ensemble, GP, conformal) with recommendations

hunts.name: ML Tools Discovery
hunts.description: Professor Pipeline's tool hunt: Find the tools professionals use

tasks.task: Find documentation for MLflow (experiment tracking)
tasks.deliverable: Link and 1-paragraph description of what it does

tasks.task: Find documentation for DVC (Data Version Control)
tasks.deliverable: Link and explanation of why data versioning matters

tasks.task: Find a tutorial on using Jupyter notebooks effectively for data science
tasks.deliverable: Link and 3 best practices from the tutorial

tasks.task: Find Weights & Biases or similar tool for ML experiment tracking
tasks.deliverable: Link and key features

bonus.task: Set up one of these tools on a small example project
